programme.title: Posljednji posao
Layer Cake
programme.desc: XXX (Daniel Craig) je zaradio bogatstvo prodajući kokain i ostale opojne droge. Sad se želi povući iz posla dok je još mlad kako bi uživao u svojem 'prljavom' novcu. Međutim, kriminalni šef Jimmy Price (Kenneth Cranham) treba nekoliko njegovih usluga prije nego što će mu dopustiti umirovljenje. Mora pronaći razmaženu ovisnicu, kćer Jimmyjevog starog prijatelja i konkurenta Eddija Templea (Michael Gambon) koja je nestala. Zatim Price želi da posrednik kupi golemu pošiljku ecstasyja od nepredvidljivoga prevaranta Duke (Jamie Foreman). U priču se uključuje i gangster čija djevojka baca oko na XX-a. Kao jedan od redatelja ovog filma spominjao se i slavni Guy Ritchie, ipak na kraju su se producenti odlučili za Matthewa Vaughna koji je producent filma 'Zdrpi i zbriši

programme.title: Pad crnog jastreba
Black hawk down
programme.desc: Film slavnog redatelja Ridleyja Scotta, "Pad Crnog jastreba", temeljen na istinitim događajima,sjajan je ratni film o američkoj vojnoj misiji u Mogadishuu, u Somaliji. Što sve, nažalost, može poći krivo u misiji spašavanja možemo vidjeti u ovom napetom akcijskom remek-djelu ratnog žarna. Kako bi spasile dvojicu poručnika na tajnom zadatku, koje je zatočio jedan od najmoćnijih somalijskih kriminalaca, američke vlasti su 1993. u Mogadishu poslale skoro 100 vojnika, s ciljem što bržeg oslobađanja. Međutim, Amerikanci su naišli na izniman otpor nekoliko stotina pripadnika somalijskih paravojnih postrojbi, pa je situacija koja se mogla riješiti relativno mirno eskalirala u pravi mali rat. U sukobima su srušena i dva američka helikoptera pa je tako jednoj spasilačkoj misiji trebalo pridodati i drugu..."Pad Crnog jastreba" izvrstan je film koji gledatelja vrlo precizno odvodi u samo središte sukoba prikazanih na ekranu, a temeljen je na stvarnoj operaciji američke vojske te na odličnoj knjizi Marka Bowdena, koji je u njoj opisao rečene događaje. Iako je u njemu okupljena brojna ekipa odličnih glumaca od, tada još uvijek mladih nada, Josha Hartnetta i Ewana McGregora, do iskusnih Toma Sizemorea i Sama Sheparda, ovo je prije svega ipak film nelagodne atmosfere jer se život može izgubiti zaista u svakom trenu. Legendarni Ridley Scott znalački je odradio svoj dio posla prenijevši na filmsko platno napeto ozračje među sukobljenim stranama. 'Pad Crnog jastreba' upravo je zbog svojih nesvakidašnjih tehničkih postignuća nagrađen s dva Oscara, za najbolju montažu i najbolji zvuk

programme.title: Strah i prijezir u Las Vegasu
Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Humorna drama. Raoul Duke (J. Depp) je novinar koji kreće u Nevadu kako bi ondje pratio zbivanja vezana uz pustinjsku utrku. S Raoulom je u automobilu njegov najbolji prijatelj dr. Gonzo (B. Del Toro), odvjetnik sa Samoe, a uskoro im se pridruži i mladi autostopist (T. Maguire). Jureći prema Las Vegasu njihov je automobil pravo skladište najrazličitijih opijata koje prijateljima služe za neprestano drogiranje i lamentiranje o životu početkom sedamdesetih. Kad drogirani Raoul napokon stigne na odredište ne sluti da je mjesto u kojem će odsjesti ugostilo godišnju konvenciju policije posvećenu borbi protiv droge... U veljači 2005. samoubojstvo je počinio jedan od najkontroverznijih američkih publicista posljednjih pola stoljeća. To je pisac i reporter Hunter S. Thompson (rođ. 1937.), rodonačelnik tzv. gonzo novinarstva kojim se označuje prepletanje beletrističkog i publicističkog pristupa, točnije poistovjećivanje pisca s opisanim događajima pri čemu se briše svaka granica između bilježenja stvarnosti i njezine umjetničke interpretacije. To je u Thompsonovu slučaju značilo odlazak u nepoznatom smjeru, uzimanje svih dostupnih narkotika te duhovito opisivanje doživljenog i umišljenog. Njegovo najpoznatije djelo nastalo na taj način je autobiografski roman Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas: A Savage Journey to the Heart of the American Dream objavljeno 1971. Nakon uspjeha s filmom "Dvanaest majmuna" režije se prihvatio Terry Gilliam (Brazil, Kralj ribara), član kreativnog tipa kultnog Letećeg cirkusa Montyja Phythona. Pokušavši što vjernije dočarati ozračje Thompsonova romana, Gilliam je prepleo dnevnički pristup, iskričave halucinacije i profiliranje cijele galerije pomaknutih likova na čelu sa središnjim (anti)junakom Raoulom čiji se boravak u Nevadi svodi na nizanje nepovezanih događaja čija je jedina konstanta Raoulova drogiranost. U glavnoj je ulozi J. Depp (serijal Pirati s Kariba, San o životu J. M. Barrieja) koji se spretno uklopio u psihodelične manifestacije i pozadinski društveni komentar filma. Deppov je partner oskarovac B. Del Toro (Traffic, 21 gram), a u epizodnim ulogama su poznata imena: T. Maguire (Spider-Man, Kućna pravila), E. Barkin (More ljubavi, Johnny Handsome), G. Busey (The Buddy Holly Story, Carny), C. Ricci (Obitelj Adams, Čudovište) i C. Diaz (Nebo boje vanilije, Charliejevi anđeli). "Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas" je uvršten u službenu konkurenciju Međunarodnog filmskog festivala u Cannesu 1998. gdje je dobio različite kritike. Inače, za dvije će godine biti posthumno ekranizirano još jedno djelo Huntera S. Thompsona, ponovno s Johnnyjem Deppom u glavnoj ulozi. Riječ je filmu "The Rum Diary" u režiji Brucea Robinsona

programme.title: Lumeni
Smart People
programme.desc: U život profesora udovca ulazi nova ljubav, ali i neočekivani posjet njegova posvojenog brata. U glavnim su ulogama Dennis Quaid i Sarah Jessica Parker. 2008. Otkako mu je preminula supruga, ostarjeli profesor Lawrence Wetherhold (Dennis Quaid) postao je ogorčen i preokupiran sam sobom. Sina (Ashton Holmes) odbio je od sebe, a kćer (Ellen Page) pretvorio je u preambicioznu djevojku bez prijatelja. No točno u trenutku kad je pomislio da je sve sjelo na svoje mjesto, život mu se odjednom počne raspadati jer se zaljubljuje u nekadašnju studenticu (Sarah Jessica Parker), a na vratima mu se pojavljuje njegov bespomoćni posvojeni brat (Thomas Haden Church) i moli ga da ga primi k sebi. Premda se uvijek oslanjao na svoju inteligenciju kojom se dosad uspješno izvlačio iz svih životnih problema, da bi se izvukao iz ove nezgodne faze života koji je odjednom postao kaotičan, bit će mu potrebno mnogo više od pameti

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
Agent cody banks
programme.desc: Cody Banks (F. Muniz) naoko je tipični srednjoškolac čija svakodnevica u Seattleu protječe između školskih klupa i obiteljskog doma u kojem živi s roditeljima (C. Stevenson i D. Roebuck) i mlađim bratom Alexom (C. Widdows). No Cody je zapeo za oko CIA-inim agentima koji su ga u tajnom ljetnom kampu unovačili u posebnu postrojbu superspretnih tinejdžera. Nakon što ga u školi posjeti tajna agentica Ronica Miles (A. Harmon), Cody dobije zadatak praćenja vršnjakinje Natalie Connors (H. Duff) čiji je otac znanstvenik (M. Connors) dospio u ruke zločinačkoj organizaciji E.R.I.S. Njezini šefovi Brinkman (I. McShane) i Molay (A. Vosloo) namjeravaju iskoristiti posljednji izum dr. Connorsa, sićušne, ali nevjerojatno moćne nanorobote, kako bi ostvarili svoje opasne planove... Filmski serijal o Jamesu Bondu nije samo doživio 21 službeni nastavak premostivši od 1962. do 2006. različite političke okolnosti i ukuse različitih naraštaja, nego je i inicirao niz manje ili više sličnih projekata. Među njima je i tinejdžerska inačica popularnog tajnog agenta 007 koja je pred ciljanu publiku stigla 2003. Riječ je o američkoj akcijskoj komediji "Agent Cody Banks" na čiju su realizaciju osim uspjeha recentnih nastavaka bondijane, svakako utjecala još dva serijala: "Austin Powers" i još više "Spy Kids". Prema priči Jeffreyja Jurgensena film je režirao nizozemski filmaš u Hollywoodu Harald Zwart (Hamilton, One Night at McCod's) duhovito iskompiliravši dobro poznate motive iz Bondovih pustolovina. Naslovna je uloga povjerena nesumnjivo jednom od najdarovitijih američkih glumaca svog naraštaja, Frankieju Munizu, rođenom 1985., koji je nastupom u humorističnoj seriji Malcolm u sredini oduševio i publiku i kritiku okušavši se istodobno i na filmskom platnu (My Dog Skip, Big Fat Liar). Banksovu ljepoticu Natalie tumači još jedna tinejdžerska zvijezda, glumica i pjevačica Hilary Duff (Popust na količinu, serija Lizzie McGuire), dok su se u ulogama zlikovaca našli dobitnik Zlatnog globusa I. McShane (serije Deadwood i Lovejoy) i A. Vosloo, poznat po hitu "Mumija" i njegovom nastavku. U ostalim su ulogama M. Donovan (Portret jedne dame, Sentinel - Agent u bijegu), A. Harmon (Frka s Dickom i Jane, serija Zakon i red) te dobitnik Emmyja K. David (Unforgivable Blackness: The Rise and Fall of Jack Johnson, miniserija Jazz). Film je dobio dvije nominacije za Young Artist Award te nominaciju za nagradu Saturn, što je uz povoljne reakcije mlađe publike bilo dovoljno za snimanje nastavka već 2004. - "Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London". Inače, jedna od izvršnih producentica filma je Madonna

programme.title: Ja i moji dvojnici
Multiplicity
programme.desc: Sigurno vam je bar jednom pala na pamet fantastična ideja da se klonirate kako bi stigli odraditi sve obaveze na vrijeme. Ako vas zanimaju potencijalni nedostaci takvog rješenja, svakako pogledajte energičnu komediju Harolda Ramisa - "Ja i moji dvojnici"! Zatrpan obavezama, građevinac Doug Kinney (Michael Keaton) rijetko kad ima vremena za mirnu večer sa suprugom Laurom (Andie MacDowell). Radeći na Institutu za znanost, Kinney jednog dana sreće neobičnog dr. Leedsa (Harris Yulin), koji mu ponudi rješenje svih problema: kloniranje! Nakon kratkog oklijevanja, Doug prihvaća ponudu i vraća se kući s prvom, posve radoholičnom kopijom. Uskoro slijede i Doug 3, macho ispičutura rođena za tulume, te blesava kopija kopije - Doug 4. Doug uskoro ima pune ruke posla s kopijama, koje, čini se, i nisu toliko slične originalu... Najpoznatiji film Harolda Ramisa sigurno je genijalni "Beskrajni dan", a "Ja i moji dvojnici" nastavlja uspješnu tradiciju koketiranja s fantastikom. Poput Eddieja Murphyja u "Luckastom profesoru", Michael Keaton ("Jack Frost", "Očajnički čin") na nevjerojatno lagan i prirodan način balansira različitim karakterima svojih filmskih klonova i oduševljava odličnim timingom. Za potpuni uspjeh, tu je i lijepa Andie MacDowell ("Beskrajni dan", "Hudson Hawk") kao Dougova supruga Laura, te karizmatični Haris Yulin ("Dan obuke", "Gas do daske 2") kao dr. Leeds(c)

programme.title: Kuća monstrum
Monster house
programme.desc: Dvanaestogodišnji DJ Walters upravo treba ući u pubertet. Očito ima previše vremena i utuvio si je u glavu kako je nešto čudno u vezi s kućom staroga Nebbercrackera s druge strane ulice. Stvari nestaju u ruševnoj kući: košarkaške lopte, tricikli, igračke i kućni ljubimci. Kad smo već kod toga, što se dogodilo s gđom Nebbercracker? Dan je prije Noći vještica i DJ i njegov prijatelj Chowder, ljubitelj slatkiša, naiđu na g. Nebbercrackera nakon što njihova košarkaška lopta odluta na tratinu, a kuća je zagonetno proguta. Kada kuća pokuša progutati i njihovu novu prijateljicu Jenny, a nitko im ne povjeruje, prestrašeni trojac utvrdi da je kuća zla i da to moraju istražiti. Za savjet se obrate jedinoj osobi na planetu koja bi bar približno mogla razumjeti što se događa, mudracu kojega zovu Skull, dvadesetogodišnjemu pizza-majstoru i vještom igraču videoigrica koji je jednom igrao četiri dana bez prestanka samo jednim penijem, s galonom čokoladna mlijeka i pelenom za odrasle. „Čuo sam za kuće koje je opsjela ljudska duša“, kaže im Skull. Misliš, kuća je živo biće? Joj! Skull ih uputi kako je jedini način da kuću spriječe da ne proguta sve živo - udariti u njezino srce – a klinci shvate da bi to trebao biti podrum. Smisle plan koji bi trebao upaliti – usisavač prerušen u čovjeka i pun lijekova. Klinci kući ponude usisavač kao mamac, da se, dok kuća spava, mogu ušuljati i podmetnuti. Njihov se plan izjalovi i kada ih kuća počne progoniti niz ulicu — da, progoniti niz ulicu - oni moraju ujediniti snage kako bi susjedstvo moglo proslaviti Noć vještica

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Odredište London
Agent cody banks 2: destination london
programme.desc: Bivši CIA-in agent ukrao je super tajni uređaj u vlasništvu vlade SAD-a, namijenjen kontroli uma. Opasna misija pronalaska i vraćanja stroja povjerena je agentu Codyju Banksu (Frankie Muniz), superšpijunu tinejdžeru. Cody mora otići u London na tajni zadatak, glumiti studenta u elitnoj glazbenoj školi i tako se približiti sumnjivcima. Na zadatku mu pomaže Derek (Anthony Anderson), bivši propali agent CIA-e kojem je ovo posljednja prilika da se dokaže i vrati u agenciju. Derek se predstavlja kao kuhar iako nema pojma o pripremi hrane. Tu je i atraktivna Emily (Hannah Spearritt), još jedna studentica na tajnom zadatku, pripadnica britanske tajne službe koja će pomoći Codyju da vrati uređaj prije nego svjetski političari padnu pod kontrolu i utjecaj zlih kriminalaca. Frankie Muniz, gledateljima ponajprije poznat po sjajnoj ulozi u jednoj od ponajboljih tinejdžerskih humorističkih serija, „Malcolm u sredini", još jednom se vraća u ulozi teen superšpijuna - Codyja Banksa. Svojoj obitelji i prijateljima, Cody Banks je tipični tinejdžer koji se obožava voziti na skateboardu, mrzi matematiku i slične predmete, te se osjeća kao potpuni idiot u društvu suprotnog spola. No Cody ima jednu veliku tajnu - on je dio tajnog programa CIA-e. Živi životom snova svakog dječaka te može voziti kao pravi kaskader, a poput Jamesa Bonda ima arsenal raznih high-tech spravica

programme.title: Lijek za nesanicu
Hurlyburly
programme.desc: Brbljavi Eddie (S. Penn) je glumački agent koji naizgled ugodan posao i raskošnu vilu na Hollywood Hillsu dijeli s Mickeyem (K. Spacey), svojim poslovnim partnerom. Uz česte konzumacije kokaina i drugih narkotika s Mickeyem, plahi i nesigurni Eddie najviše vremena provodi s ambicioznim glumcem Philom (C. Palminteri), sitnim kriminalcem sklonim agresivnim ispadima, i scenaristom Artiejem (G. Shandling), utjecajnim holivudskim igračem koji se pretvara da im je iskren prijatelj. Phil dečke često gnjavi pričama o svojim problemima sa suprugom Susan, koja je nedavno zatražila razvod. Dok razmišlja o traženju utjehe u naručju temperamentne prostitutke Bonnie (M. Ryan), slobodoumne djevojke koja bira svoje klijente, Eddieja prilično smeta što je Mickey u vezi s njegovom bivšom djevojkom Darlene (R. Wright Penn) do koje je Eddieju još uvijek stalo. Sve će se dodatno pogoršati nakon što mu Artie na brigu povjeri problematičnu tinejdžericu Donnu (A. Paquin), koja će za privremeni smještaj dečkima ponuditi seksualne usluge... Godine 1998. prikazana u konkurenciji filmskog festivala u Veneciji, na kojem je Sean Penn za najbolju mušku ulogu osvojio kup Volpi, intrigantna egzistencijalistička drama redatelja Anthonyja Drazana (Zebrahead, Imaginary Crimes, serije Zapadno krilo) uspjela je adaptacija kazališnog djela Metež dramatičara i scenarista Davida Rabea (Žrtve rata, Tvrtka, Streamers). Priča o tjeskobnim egzistencijalnim i intimnim dramama skupine slikovitih protagonista pregledno je i sugestivno režirano ostvarenje. Zvjezdanu glumačku postavu predvodi sjajni dvostruki oskarovac S. Penn (Boje nasilja, Mi nismo anđeli, Carlitov način, Igra, Tanka crvena linija, Mistična rijeka, 21 gram, Prevoditeljica), zatim također dvostruki oskarovac K. Spacey (Zaposlena djevojka, Glengarry Glen Ross, Privedite osumnjičene, Sedam, Pregovarač, Vrtlog života, Život Davida Galea, 21), a njihovi su partneri R. Wright Penn (Forrest Gump, Čuvar prijelaza, Poruka u boci, Zakletva, Raspjevani detektiv, Beowulf, sapunica Santa Barbara) i C. Palminteri (Priča iz Bronxa, Privedite osumnjičene, Analiziraj ovo, serija Kojak). U sporednim ulogama su oskarovka A. Paquin (Piano, Jane Eyre, serijal X-Men, Korak do slave, 25. sat) i M. Ryan (Top Gun, The Doors, Romansa u Seattleu, Kad muškarac voli ženu, Ovisni o ljubavi, Grad anđela, Dokaz života, Žene), nekad omiljena junakinja romantičnih komedija koja je upravo ulogom u ovom filmu započela niz ozbiljnijih i mračnijih rola. Filmsku glazbu potpisuju nagrađivani David Baerwald (Undiscovered, U divljini) i Steve Lindsey (Dobrodošli u Sarajevo), a fotografiju za Oscara nominirani i Srebrnim berlinskim medvjedom ovjenčani Changwei Gu (Zbogom, moja konkubino, Jesen u New Yorku)

programme.title: Vječni sjaj nepobjedivog uma
Eternal Sunshine Of The Spotless Mind
programme.desc: Joel Barish saznaje da se njegova bivša djevojka Clementine podvrgla eksperimentalnom zahvatu dr. Mierzwiaka da bi izbrisala sjećanja na njihovu vezu. Da ga ne bi nadmašila, Joel se odlučuje za isti zahvat. Dok Mierzwiakovi šeprtljavi učenici Stan i Patrick obavljaju zahvat na Joelu - tijekom večeri u njegovu stanu - on pokušava sačuvati sječanja na Clementine od brisanja

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Pretkraj 21. stoljeća, supkultura ljudi zaražena je genetskom mutacijom zbog koje su brži, izdržljiviji i pametniji. Kako sve više ljudi biva zaraženo virusom, vlasti se sve više plaše njihove rastuće snage. Oni koji su mutirali su izopćenici, podvrgnuti strašnim testiranjima i bačeni u karantenu. Vlada ih želi uništiti, ali jedna im se žena ispriječila na tom putu: ultra-lijepa, ultra-ubojita Violet (Milla Jovovich). Zadivljujućim borilačkim vještinama i kameleonskim sposobnostima, Violet postaje ratnica koja štiti novu rasu - traži osvetu za one koji su je stvorili. Violet štiti i 9-godišnjeg zagonetnog dječaka (Cameron Bright), a vlasti i zaraženi ljudi je očajnički žele zaustaviti

programme.title: Mali glas
Little Voice
programme.desc: Stanovnica dosadnog engleskog obalnog gradića znana kao Mali Glas tuguje za ocem, opsjednuta je svojom zbirkom ploča i pjeva uz omiljene izvođače. Njezin talent da imitira slatke glasove Judy Garland, Marilyn Monroe i Shirley Bassey ubrzo otkriva dečko njezine dominantne majke, estradni menadžer. Pokušaji da je uzdignu u zvijezde isprva su uspješni nakon nastupa pred lokalnim stanovništvom, ali Mali Glas ubrzo sazna njihove sebične namjere te se ponovno povuče i između njih postavi emotivnu blokadu(c)
programme.category: Velika Britanija, komična drama nominirana za Oscara, 1998.

programme.title: Pad crnog jastreba
Black hawk down
programme.desc: Film slavnog redatelja Ridleyja Scotta, "Pad Crnog jastreba", temeljen na istinitim događajima,sjajan je ratni film o američkoj vojnoj misiji u Mogadishuu, u Somaliji. programme.title: Pray For Death

programme.title: Zero To Sixty
programme.desc: A divorced man hooks up with a street-smart 16-year-old who makes her living by repossessing cars from their owners(c)

programme.title: Beat Street
programme.desc: Urban ghetto kids from the South Bronx find creative outlets in painting graffiti, breakdancing, rapping and developing new disco D.J. routines

programme.title: Hannah i njezine sestre
Hannah and her sisters
programme.desc: Obitelj ostarjelih zabavljača okuplja se svake godine na američki državni blagdan Dan zahvalnosti. To je prigoda da se učine rezimei njihovih isprepletenih života i sudbina, a i da se razviju novi odnosi. I tako Hannah (M. Farrow), bivša supruga hipohondra Mickeya (W. Allen), ne sluti da će se na taj dan njezin novi suprug Elliot (M. Caine) zaljubiti u njezinu sestru, bivšu alkoholičarku Lee (B. Hershey), i da sestra Holly (D. Wiest) nema većih šansi u svojim glumačkim aspiracijama. Istodobno, Hannin bivši muž Mickey ulazi u najkritičniju fazu svoje hipohondrije. No, ovaj put je možda doista bolestan.... Suptilna komedija čiji je sadržaj skup svakidašnjih problema - poslovnih, ljubavnih, obiteljskih - jedne njujorške obitelji iz srednje klase. Razvijajući odnose među likovima na granici između drame, melodrame i komedije, Allen ostvaruje svojevrsnu fresku života u urbanom New Yorku, a usredotočenjem na likove triju sestara diskretno citira slavnu dramu A. P. Čehova. Film privlačnim čine i poznate partiture jazza i popularne glazbe iz tridesetih i četrdesetih i, kao uvijek u Allenovim filmovima, niz vrsnih glumačkih kreacija. Film je dobio tri Oscara: za scenarij (W. Allen), najbolju mušku (M. Caine) i žensku sporednu ulogu (D. Wiest). Osim toga, nagrađen je i Zlatnim globusom u kategoriji najboljeg mjuzikla/komedije

programme.title: SAFARI 3000
Safari 3000
programme.desc: "Saddled" with Playboy photographer Stockard Channing, David Carradine perticipates in a transcontinental road rally. His evil rival (Christopher Lee) will stop at nothing to win. A lighthearted tribute to DEATHRACE 2000

programme.title: Touched
programme.desc: Two mental institution inmates who escape fall in love and try to live a normal life together in the outside world

programme.title: Oči anđela
The tender
programme.desc: Drama. Pritisnut kroničnom besparicom i prisiljen skrbiti o svojoj malodobnoj kćeri (E. Raab), Bobby (J. Travolta) je stalno u potrazi za bilo kakvim poslom i zaradom. Sklon alkoholu, Bobby je prilično neodgovoran samohrani otac. Odluči posuditi novac od brata svoje pokojne supruge Barbare, Cissyja (T. Larriva), koji je gangster i bavi se organiziranjem ilegalnih borbi pasa. Jednog od pasa koji je izgubio borbu prigrli Bobbyjeva kći, dok je Bobby počeo raditi za gangstera. Uskoro Cissy pošalje svoje ljude da premlate Bobbyja i podmetnu mu krađu manje svote novca. Bobby im se suprotstavi i bježi sa svojom kćeri u Kaliforniju, a gangsteri ih slijede... Snimljen pod suproducentskom paskom glasovitog Michaela Douglasa, film redatelja Roberta Harmona (Autostoper, Nowhere to Run, Astronauts, The Crossing, TV serija Odjel za umorstva: Život na ulici), filmaša koji je za režiju mini-serija Gotti i Ike: Counting to D-Day osvojio nominacije za Emmy, zanimljivo je i razmjerno intrigantno djelo temeljeno na istinitim događajima. Film je nominiran za nagradu publike na filmskom festivalu u Deauvilleu 1991. godine, a emotivna, šarmantna i donekle uznemirujuća priča govori o otuđenom ocu, slabiću sklonom alkoholu, koji ne uspijeva preboljeti supruginu smrt i gotovo sve svoje frustracije iskaljuje na senzibilnoj kćeri. Međutim, kao katalizator u rješavanju osobnih i međusobnih problema, ocu i djevojčici pomoći će slučajno spašen pas. U glavnoj ulozi je karizmatični J. Travolta (Carrie, Briljantin, Gradski kauboj, Pucanj nije brisan, Ostati živ, Breme bijelog čovjeka, Slomljena strijela, Fenomen, Michael, Čovjek bez lica, Ludi grad, Predsjedničke boje, Tanka crvena linija, Generalova kći, Bojno polje Zemlja, Operacija Swordfish), glumac koji je za glavne uloge u "Groznici subotnje večeri" Johna Badhama i kultnom "Paklenom šundu" Quentina Tarantina nominiran za Oscara, a za potonji je film nominiran i za Zlatni globus, koji je osvojio za nastup u izvrsnoj krimi komediji "Uhvatite malog" Barryja Sonnenfelda. Njegova je partnerica darovita djevojčica E. Raab (Little Sweetheart, Fantastična braća Baker, Hostile Hostages), a u sporednim ulogama nastupaju poznati J. DeMunn (Ragtime, Frances, Mjehur ubojica, Guverner i striptizeta, Iskupljenje u Shawshanku, Zelena milja, Hollywoodland), također nominiran za nagradu Emmy, te iskusni R. Edson (Očajnički tražeći Susan, Slobodan dan Ferrisa Buellera, Vod smrti, Dobro jutro, Vijetname, Osmorica izvan igre, Učini pravu stvar, Lulu na mostu, Hotel od milijun dolara, Starsky & Hutch). Filmsku glazbu skladao je Randy Edelman (Blizanci, Istjerivači duhova 2, Policajac iz dječjeg vrtića, Moj rođak Vinny, Posljednji Mohikanac, Maska, Dok si spavao, Diabolique, Šest dana, sedam noći, Ubojica mekog srca), za rad na izvrsnom filmu "Posljednji Mohikanac" Michaela Manna nominiran za Zlatni globus i nagradu BAFTA, a filmsku fotografiju potpisuje nizozemski snimatelj Theo van de Sande (Još jednom, Wayneov svijet, Vulkan, Blade, Okrutne namjere, Tatica, Vražji Nicky, Zaboravljeni zločin)

programme.title: Watch It
programme.desc: Mike, Danny, and Rick are grown men who share a house in Chicago. They take on a fourth house mate, John.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Tim and Nancy appear to have nothing in common, and from their first date their relationship looks destined for termination.But who needs something in common when they're in love.This is a refreshing look at two singles who finally find the perfect match

programme.title: Golden Gate
programme.desc: 1952: Law school graduate Kevin Walker (Matt Dillon) is recruited by the FBI and instructed to root out communist public enemies amongst the San Francisco Chinese community. Soon his loyalties become divided when he falls in love with Marilyn (Joan Chen), a laundryman's daughter

programme.title: Na putu prema dolje
Breaking bad
programme.desc: Iako bi trebao biti jako zabrinut, Walt otkrije da ga uzbuđuje biti korak ispred policijske istrage koja bi ga mogla povezati s dva ubojstva. Batine koje primi natjeraju Jesseja (Aaron Paul) da odluči prodati svoju kuću i u potpunosti raskrstiti s prodajom droge, no Walterov novi poslovni dogovor s nemilosrdnim Tucom zahtijeva ponovno otvaranje njihova laboratorija za meth. Iako ne uspijevaju proizvesti količinu koju su obećali Tucu, Walt ga uspijeva nagovoriti da im financira nabavu nove opreme i sirovina za posao. Skyler (Anna Gunn) se obraća dr. Delcavoliju u nadi da će saznati dobre vijesti o Waltovu oporavku, a kada je uhite nakon što pokuša vratiti vrijedan dar koji je dobila od sestre Marie, ona posumnja da je ukraden

programme.title: Desert Hearts
programme.desc: It is 1950s Nevada, and Professor Vivian Bell arrives to get a divorce. She's unsatisfied with her marriage.

programme.desc: Skupina divljih tinejdžera odlazi na koledž i nađe se u poplavi ludila, neslanih šala, partijanja i nepredvidivih seksualnih situacija

programme.title: Frikovi

programme.desc: Radnja počinje na dobrotvornoj priredbi organiziranoj za program u Santa Barbari koji pomaže rizičnim skupinama mladeži da prestanu biti članovi bandi. Počasni je uzvanik osnivač dobrotvorne udruge, Deacon Jones. Ondje se nalazi i njegova financijska direktorica Tina, bivša članica bande koja je uspješno završila spomenuti program te je zadužena za svečanosti, ali i donacije i obveze

programme.desc: Pogrebnica Grace Larsen, Woodyjeva školska kolegica i bivša ljubavnica, obavijestila je policiju u Santa Barbari da smatra da je Woody pogriješio na obdukciji. U dosjeu preminuloga Boba Whitea navedeno je da je Bobovo uho vješto odrezano instrumentom, a nije ga, kao što je Woody zaključio, odrezala guma u autobusnoj nesreći u kojoj je poginuo. Zbog ovih vijesti čini se da je Bob možda ubijen, a nije poginuo u nesreći. Woodyjev posao je ugrožen, a načelnica Vick naredila je Shawnu i Gusu da pomognu u novootvorenoj istrazi Bobove smrti i pomognu vratiti Woodyjev ugled

We Own The Night
programme.desc: Bobby Green se ne želi baviti obiteljskim poslom. On je menadžer popularnog ruskog kulba El Caribe u New Yorku i odrekao se obiteljske policijske tradicije. Za Bobbyja je život zabava, disko glazba i zadimljene večeri koje provodi s prelijepom djevojkom Amadom. Godina je 1988. i posao drogom cvjeta u New Yorku. Kada više ne bude mogao izbjeći lošu navadu poslovanja svojih ruskih šefova, Bobby će se žestoko zamjeriti obitelji..(c)

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake naiđe na zagonetku ubojstva dok je u ribolovu s Desom i Malom. Sloan prelazi granicu. Des skiva tajnu od Doyleovih

programme.title: Frikovi
Psych
programme.desc: U vijestima je prikazan Thane, čovjek iz Santa Barbare koji je oslobođen iz zatvora nakon što je njegov odvjetnik iz Projekta nevinih otkrio da je pogrešno osuđen za pljačku restorana u kojem je radio. Thane naglašava nepravdu koja mu je učinjena i zbog toga je nepovjerljiv prema policiji i čitavom zakonodavstvu. Umjesto da se obrati policiji u Santa Barbari, Thane je zamolio Shawna i Gusa da mu pomognu s odštetnom nagodbom. Da bi Thane dobio odštetu, počinitelj zločina za koji je nevini Thane osuđen mora biti pronađen i osuđen. U suprotnom, Thane nema pravo na odštetu. Shawn i Gus pristaju mu pomoći jer ih Thane uvjerava da bi ovim slučajem trebali obaviti svoju dužnost prema čovječanstvu. Shawna i Gusa Thane je smjesta očarao svojim pristupom da pravda mora biti zadovoljena te mu pristaju pomoći

programme.title: Beethoven 5
Beethoven's 5th
programme.desc: Za vrijeme ljetnog odmora u starom rudarskom gradu, obiteljski pas Beethoven iskopa trag lokacije legendarnog skrivenog blaga

programme.title: Cura na tajnom zadatku
Covert Affairs
programme.desc: Auggie se vraća staroj ljubavi, no ubrzo postaje očigledno da je još uvijek zaljubljen u Annie. Wilcox traži pomoć od Caldera

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Robert pokušava dokazati svoju nedužnost nakon pozitivnog testa na drogu. No nakon nekoliko vizija ubojstva, počinje sumnjati u svoju ubrojivost

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Članovi obitelji Reagan udružuju se u namjeri da unište osobu odgovornu za gubitak bliske im osobe

programme.title: Iznenadna smrt
Sudden death
programme.desc: Nakon što prije dvije godine iz požara nije uspio spasiti djevojčicu, vatrogasac Darren McCord (J.-C. Van Damme) mučen grižnjom savjesti povukao se iz službe, razveo od supruge Kathi (K. McNeil) i zaposlio kao vatrogasni inspektor hokejaške dvorane. Na dan održavanja važne utakmice, na kojoj će biti i potpredsjednik SAD-a (R. J. Barry), Darren na uzbudljiv susret odluči povesti i svoju djecu, sinčića Tylera (R. Malinger) i kći Emily (W. Wright). Dok djecu upoznaje s kuharom Ferrarom i maskotom domaće momčadi, Darren ne sluti da u dvoranu ulazi skupina terorista predvođena nemilosrdnim Joshuom Fossom (P. Boothe). Kao nekadašnji vladin agent, Foss zna kako jednostavno eliminirati tjelohranitelje. Otmu potpredsjednika i njegovu pratnju, a u znak opomene ustrijeli Ferraru i nekoliko talaca, dok njegova ekipa minira dvoranu. Od premijera i vlade traži da na posebne bankovne račune prebace milijardu i 700 milijuna dolara ili će na kraju svake trećine ubiti po nekoliko talaca. U međuvremenu, Darren smjesti Emily i Tylera na tribine, upozori ih da ni u kom slučaju ne napuštaju svoja mjesta, te miran krene na posao. Međutim, Emily će ubrzo dospjeti u ruke Fossu, a Darren će shvatiti da se uz pomoć šefa osiguranja Hallmarka (D. Harewood) mora suprotstaviti teroristima i spasiti svoju djecu... Atraktivan, dinamičan i uzbudljiv akcijski triler pouzdanog direktora fotografije, producenta, scenarista i redatelja Petera Hyamsa (Svemirska postaja broj 1, Planet prokletih, 2010: Druga odiseja, The Presidio, Uski prolaz, Gledajte dalje, Vremenski policajac, Muzej straha, Početak kraja). Redatelj Hyams i scenarist Gene Quintano (Rudnici kralja Solomona, Policijska akademija 3 i 4, Allan Quatermain i izgubljeni zlatni grad, Besmrtno oružje) vješto variraju elemente zapleta i sve sastavnice prvih dvaju nastavaka serijala "Umri muški". Slično policajcu Johnu McClaneu, koji u filmovima Johna McTiernana i Rennyja Harlina suprugu spašava od terorista, ovdje vatrogasac Darren McCord želi spasiti kći i sina. Upravo ta crta intimne Darrenove drame ono je po čemu se večerašnji film presudno kvalitativno razlikuje od ostatka filmografije J.-C. Van Dammea (Krvavi sport, Kickboxer, Lavlje srce, Univerzalni vojnik, Teška meta, Vremenski policajac, Ulični borac, Maksimalni rizik, Double Team, Legionar), uz glasovitu Audrey Hepburn zasigurno najpoznatije belgijske filmske zvijezde. U ulozi Van Dammeova protivnika nastupa karizmatični P. Boothe (Cruising, Južnjačka utjeha, Crvena zora, Smaragdna šuma, Teksaški graničar, Tombstone, Nixon, Pogrešno skretanje, Časni ljudi, Anđeli i demoni, Sin City, serije Philip Marlowe, Deadwood), a u sporednoj se pojavljuje poznati D. Harewood (Sokol i snjegović, Full Metal Jacket, Gothika, Napad na policijsku postaju br. 13)

programme.desc: Nešto nemilice siše krv stoki u Središnjoj i Južnoj Americi. Domoroci to stvorenje nazivaju "El Chupacabra" ili "Kozo-sisač". Žar Chupacabre poharala je Južnu Ameriku. Jesu li to samo babske priče ili je to stvorenje stvarno

programme.title: Priče o olujama
programme.desc: Tornada s munjama, divlji brzaci, pakli, uragani, zasljepljujuće mećave i vodeni zidovi: bijes Majke prirode viđen kroz oči onih koji su preživjeli ekstremne vremenske uvjete i njihovih herojskih spasitelja

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Ekipa traži skriveno blago u napuštenom hotelu Hot Springs, poznatom po tome što su ondje odsjeli Babe Ruth i Al Capone

programme.title: Gospodari rata
programme.desc: Sean puca iz četverocijevnog pištolja s okretnim cilindrom iz sredine 18. stoljeća, a Hammer pregledava navodni japanski mač katana

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Ekipa istražuje napuštenu tvornicu čipke i otkriva skrivene tajne, među kojima i kuglanu

programme.title: Taljenje novca
programme.desc: Russel i Terence odlaze na prodaju na imanju i cjenkaju se s nepopustljivim pregovaračem za srebrni servis za čaj

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Prvi svjetski rat
programme.desc: Čini se da je za saveznike sve izgubljeno, ali tada Amerika ulazi u rat. No u pobjedi, Versajski ugovor položit će temelje katastrofe

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Hitlerov uspon
programme.desc: Adolfa Hitlera smatrali su čudakom na marginama političkog života Njemačke - dok 1929. ekonomska kriza nije sve promijenila

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: 3. rujna 2010. UPS, let 6. Ubrzo nakon uzleta Boeinga 747 iz Dubaija, oglasio se alarm za požar. Nadajući se da će ugušiti plamen, piloti aktiviraju sustav za suzbijanje požara, ali situacija eskalira pa posada mora što prije prizemljiti masivni 747

programme.title: Aerodrom u Dubaiju 3
Ultimate Airport Dubai
programme.desc: Mel odgovara na putnikov poziv upomoć i suočena je s najgorim mogućim scenarijem. Nizel mora odlučiti pustiti napola pun teretni avion ili zadržati ga. Naučnik vatrogasac pomaže ugasiti zapaljeno gorivo, a inženjer Nizalman testira obnovljeni motor

programme.title: Megagrađevine
programme.desc: Tajne iza izgradnje Marina Bay Sands u Singapuru koja obuhvaća hotele, muzej, kasino, šetalište uz more i kazalište
programme.category: Trkalište s pet zvjezdica u Dubaiju

programme.title: Megagrađevine
programme.desc: Tajne iza izgradnje Marina Bay Sands u Singapuru koja obuhvaća hotele, muzej, kasino, šetalište uz more i kazalište
programme.category: Trkalište s pet zvjezdica u Dubaiju

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Nakon kobnog pada u očajnim uvjetima na aerodromu Čang Kaj-šek u Taipeiju, istražitelji su na pisti otkrili nešto šokantno

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
programme.desc: Granica između fizičkog i virtualnog svijeta počinje nestajati dok Stephen Hawking i njegov tim znanstvenika istražuju najnovije inovacije

programme.title: Ništa od navedenog
programme.desc: Pokusi Tima Shawa nastavljaju se kad izrađuje bombu od vrhnja za kavu, u mikrovalnoj peče žarulju i na neobičan način razbija pivsku bocu

programme.title: Kozmos: Odiseja u svemiru
programme.desc: Naš svijet visoke tehnologije i njegove elektroničke tajne demistificirani su dok saznajemo priču o geniju kojemu se divio i Albert Einstein

programme.title: Zona gradnje
programme.desc: Svjedočite jednom od najtežih poslova na svijetu na čudovišnoj naftnoj platformi u surovom okruženju otvorenog Sjevernog mora

programme.title: Megagradnje
programme.desc: Uglavnom izgrađena od recikliranih plastičnih boca, tajvanska deveterokatnica EcoARK Pavillion postavlja novo mjerilo u zelenom graditeljstvu

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća 11
programme.desc: Nakon kobnog sudara 10.000 metara nad džunglama Indonezije, istražitelji dolaze do uznemirujućeg otkrića

programme.title: Napušteno
programme.desc: Stručnjaci za preuređenja Jay, Dan i Mark odlaze u povijesnu Philadelphiju istražiti napuštenu gotičku crkvu i školu

programme.title: Opaka tuna: Sjever protiv Juga II
Wicked Tuna: North Vs South II
programme.desc: Sezona lova na tunu plavih peraja tek što nije zatvorena. Neke južnjačke ribarice su u vodstvu. Sjevernjačke ribarice i ženski trio čame na začelju. Sad, kad je ostalo još pet dana, pritisak je opipljiv

programme.title: Opaka tuna: Sjever protiv Juga II
Wicked Tuna: North Vs South II
programme.desc: Dva dana prije kraja sezone ribarice „Reels of Fortune i „Fishin' Frenzy rame su uz rame na vrhu ljestvice i dijeli ih tek 200 dolara. Jedna ili dvije dobre tune mogle bi jednu od ekipa katapultirati na vrh

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
programme.desc: Zima je stigla na autocestu Coquihalla, a Jamie Davis i ekipa spašavaju tovar drva iz unesrećenog kamiona u prvom velikom udesu sezone

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: Transportni zrakoplov UN-a DC-6 leti u tajnu misiju, a među putnicima je i glavni tajnik UN-a general Dag Hammarskjöld. Nekoliko trenutaka prije slijetanja, zrakoplov udara o tlo, samo 16 km od piste. Smrt svjetskog vođe izazvala je šok i nevjericu

programme.title: Podzemlje
programme.desc: U Willistonu u Sjevernoj Dakoti, boom bušotina doveo je tisuće radnika u ovaj nekad mirni gradić. Ali groznica potrage za crnim zlatom u grad je dovela i crno tržište. Otpušteni radnici postali su najdomišljatiji kriminalci

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: 10. listopada 2006. Atlantic Airways, let 670 u britanskom zračnom prostoru prevozi putnike naftne kompanije na posao. Na rutinskoj stanici na norveškom otoku Stord zrakoplov se zanosi izvan piste i pada niz strmi nasip. Četvero ljudi je poginulo

programme.title: Podzemlje
programme.desc: Od prijevara na kartama do oružanih pljački, Las Vegas privlači sve američke kriminalce u svoja kasina. Kako bi se zaštitila, kasina su postala organizacije za borbu protiv kriminala koje rabe vrhunske uređaje za nadzor i vojsku od 5000 zaštitara

programme.title: Preživljavanje na Aljasci
programme.desc: Vozeći se povijesnom aljaškom željeznicom, ekipe odlaze do udaljene riječne doline i prelaze planine, kanjone i jezero puno santi leda

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
programme.desc: 10. listopada 2006. Atlantic Airways, let 670 u britanskom zračnom prostoru prevozi putnike naftne kompanije na posao. Na rutinskoj stanici na norveškom otoku Stord zrakoplov se zanosi izvan piste i pada niz strmi nasip. Četvero ljudi je poginulo

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: Seizing the Scheldt Estuary fell to the Canadians who fought a bloody victorious battle through mud, minefields and canals to secure the critical shipping supply route to the Allied troops waiting in Antwerp. In contrast, the British attempt to break through to the Rhine at Arnhem is a tragic failure and becomes known as "the bridge too far"

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: August 16th, 1987 Northwest Airlines Flight #255 is on the tarmac at Detroit Metropolitan Airport. The pilots are bound for Phoenix, Arizona, but first they have to find their runway. Controllers have given them a last minute change and the pilots are having a hard time locating the entrance to their runway. Finally, 45 minutes behind schedule, the pilots taxi the DC-9 into position. The airplane is soon roaring down the runway at 95 miles an hour (150 kilometers and hour). Captain John Maus pulls back on his control column, but the plane barely manages to get off the ground before it hits a light pole, slams into a building, and disintegrates on a highway. This is the second-deadliest airplane disaster in US history... But can investigators determine what went wrong

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: It's a regular morning in the lively town of Amagasaki when a busy commuter train derails and crashes into an apartment building, killing over a hundred passengers and trapping hundreds more inside

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Aarathi Prasad road-tests Boston Dynamics' incredible animal-inspired robots

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: They have no word for time, or history. But they are the keepers of the oldest continuing civilization on earth -a visionary culture that predates the Pyramids, the Bible, even the end of the last ice age. The Aborigines of Australia see themselves as the guardians of the world itself-a world they sing into being every day. Journey into the Australian bush with host Wade Davis, as he travels the mystical trails of the "Songlines" to unlock the secrets of a mysterious way of life known as the "Dreaming

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In the third episode of Season 3, we profile two unique individuals who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. In Smithville, Tennessee, Tracy Foutch is a father and business owner who fears that a devastating EF5 tornado will rip through his neighborhood. To protect his family, he plans to use his factory as a secret laboratory for his preps where he will create a bug out vehicle that runs off of destruction. In Florida, Dan Rojas is channeling the power of the sun to keep his family alive if devastating lightning storms rip through Tampa. To help recover after a storm that he believes will knock out the power grid, Dan is set to create his biggest prep yet. We join these two men as they take their ordinary lives into uncharted territory, into the world of Doomsday Preppers

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 6
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is the show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded. In this episode Richard Hammond explores the humiliating and painful potential of scooter stunts, break dancing and swinging on ropes

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Aarathi Prasad road-tests Boston Dynamics' incredible animal-inspired robots

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The Desert and Grassland's Deadly Dozen begins with the world's fastest rattler: the sidewinder. Then we travel to Africa for a close up look at one of the world's deadliest - and tiniest - arachnids, the six-eyed sand spider. Next, the beautiful and highly toxic zebra snake. On the open savannahs, three top predators rule the plains by working together - the African lion, the cheetah, and the spotted hyena. Next we take a closer look at three deadly deceivers, the desert death adder, the western coral snake, and the African wild dog. But humans take dangerous risks when they ignore the boundaries set by massive plant eaters - black rhinos and American bison. Finally, the hour concludes with one man's firsthand account of what it's like to face down the largest creature walking the Earth: the African Elephant(c)

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: Rob has most of his prepper boxes checked: enough food to feed his family for two years, self-made bullets, and a stockpile of weapons. But in order to protect his family from Doomsday marauders, he is devising the ultimate booby-trap system. With the help of a neighbor, Rob is securing his Texas property's perimeter with an elaborate system of alarms, traps and defense mechanisms. But when an unexpected tornado hits, Rob goes into instant prepper mode and booby-trap plans must be put on hold. In Tennessee, Greg is preparing for a national financial catastrophe and plans to spend most of Doomsday in an undisclosed location - an invisible tree house miles from city limits where he hopes to be safe from urban looters. If the build goes as planned, Greg and his family will have a tree house 12 feet into the forest canopy, with mirrored paneling so it reflects the surrounding trees, and a stockpile of food, water and ammo

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: It's Riley's biggest fix ever! A machine seventeen miles around - worth seven billion dollars! The Large Hadron Collider is the largest atom-smasher ever built - a colossal scientific instrument buried three hundred feet underground, spanning two countries, designed to recreate conditions a billionth of a second after the Big Bang. It could be our key to unlocking the secrets of the universe - except for one tiny thing: it's broken. Nine months ago the world watched as this mother of all atom-smashers almost self-destructed. Now Riley has an exclusive inside view - repairing the final critical component of the Large Hadron Collider and restarting the greatest scientific adventure since we landed a man on the Moon

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Mick, who is suffering from osteoporosis, has a much loved Jaguar E-type in his garage. He is too ill to be able to finish the restoration of his car

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Experts examine how scientists are fighting for our survival by battling the world's biggest killer diseases

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Join Wade Davis as he ventures deep into the South American rainforest to explore the depths of an ancient people who have lived for centuries in close harmony with the natural world around them. Wade's mission is to learn from a culture, which may be the last of a lost Amazonian civilization. His hope is to meet the River people and document a ritual never filmed before. In doing so he will see the world through their eyes and try to understand the secrets of their survival

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: We might think our cities of glass, concrete and steel are immune to the dangers of nature. But we're wrong. Wild creatures survive and even thrive in the heart of the city. Among these many species is an exceptional group of twelve - an assembly of mammals, arachnids, and reptiles equipped with an arsenal of predatory and defensive skills and weaponry. Now, witness how they adapt and prosper in a world dominated by humans, hunting on the city streets or altering their behavior to capitalize our presence. Either way, when our paths cross with theirs, the results can be devastating. They're tough, and adaptable, and dangerous-they are The City's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Posljednji ratni heroji
Last War Heroes
programme.desc: In the dead of one of the coldest winters on record, under-armed and under-prepared US infantry divisions find themselves fighting off the best of the German army in the inaccessible hill and forest country of the Ardennes

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Mick, who is suffering from osteoporosis, has a much loved Jaguar E-type in his garage. He is too ill to be able to finish the restoration of his car

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: Rob has most of his prepper boxes checked: enough food to feed his family for two years, self-made bullets, and a stockpile of weapons. But in order to protect his family from Doomsday marauders, he is devising the ultimate booby-trap system. With the help of a neighbor, Rob is securing his Texas property's perimeter with an elaborate system of alarms, traps and defense mechanisms. But when an unexpected tornado hits, Rob goes into instant prepper mode and booby-trap plans must be put on hold. In Tennessee, Greg is preparing for a national financial catastrophe and plans to spend most of Doomsday in an undisclosed location - an invisible tree house miles from city limits where he hopes to be safe from urban looters. If the build goes as planned, Greg and his family will have a tree house 12 feet into the forest canopy, with mirrored paneling so it reflects the surrounding trees, and a stockpile of food, water and ammo

programme.title: Svjetlost na kraju svijeta
Light At The Edge of The World
programme.desc: Join Wade Davis as he ventures deep into the South American rainforest to explore the depths of an ancient people who have lived for centuries in close harmony with the natural world around them. Wade's mission is to learn from a culture, which may be the last of a lost Amazonian civilization. His hope is to meet the River people and document a ritual never filmed before. In doing so he will see the world through their eyes and try to understand the secrets of their survival

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: We might think our cities of glass, concrete and steel are immune to the dangers of nature. But we're wrong. Wild creatures survive and even thrive in the heart of the city. Among these many species is an exceptional group of twelve - an assembly of mammals, arachnids, and reptiles equipped with an arsenal of predatory and defensive skills and weaponry. Now, witness how they adapt and prosper in a world dominated by humans, hunting on the city streets or altering their behavior to capitalize our presence. Either way, when our paths cross with theirs, the results can be devastating. They're tough, and adaptable, and dangerous-they are The City's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Experts examine how scientists are fighting for our survival by battling the world's biggest killer diseases

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: It's Riley's biggest fix ever! A machine seventeen miles around - worth seven billion dollars! The Large Hadron Collider is the largest atom-smasher ever built - a colossal scientific instrument buried three hundred feet underground, spanning two countries, designed to recreate conditions a billionth of a second after the Big Bang. It could be our key to unlocking the secrets of the universe - except for one tiny thing: it's broken. Nine months ago the world watched as this mother of all atom-smashers almost self-destructed. Now Riley has an exclusive inside view - repairing the final critical component of the Large Hadron Collider and restarting the greatest scientific adventure since we landed a man on the Moon

Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Mick, who is suffering from osteoporosis, has a much loved Jaguar E-type in his garage. He is too ill to be able to finish the restoration of his car

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Experts examine how scientists are fighting for our survival by battling the world's biggest killer diseases

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta

Either way, when our paths cross with theirs, the results can be devastating. They're tough, and adaptable, and dangerous-they are The City's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan: Žive pčele
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the lives of two different families who fear the end of the world is fast approaching. In Dayton, Texas, John Tucker is preparing for category 5 hurricanes that will change the landscape forever. Around town he is known as the bee man but what people dont know is that John Tucker is planning to use his bees as the ultimate prep. Next, we go inside the lives of two brothers, Bret and Shane. The both live in Utah and do everything together. We follow these brothers as they built the ultimate sniper rifle on a property 5000 feet above sea level all in preparation for an upcoming economic collapse. We join these two families as they prepare for the end of the world, as we know it

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This week the teams are asked to buy and break a car that cost more than fifty thousand pounds in today's money when it was new. Ben and Frankie decide to go for a touch of class with a Mercedes SL whilst George and Sheldon opt for performance with a BMW M3

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Howie faces a seemingly impossible challenge after a massive wreck spills lumber across a busy highway

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Stephen Hawking and his team investigate how science is on the cusp of making urban living not just a richer experience, but more fun too

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan continues his quest to find and protect the world's largest freshwater fish in the frigid rivers of Mongolia. He will travel by plane, truck, and horseback to find the largest trout known as the Hucho taimen. This is not your everyday dinner trout. This monster can grow up to 6 feet in length and weighs up to 200 pounds

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: Oceans cover two thirds of our planet. These five massive bodies of water create the largest eco system on the planet. The Pacific, Atlantic, Indian, Arctic and Antarctic Oceans contain some of the most dangerous animals on earth. Unique and venomous creatures hunt in tropical waters, while powerful carnivores rule the icy Antarctic. Ideally suited for survival in their ocean environments, twelve elite creatures stand above the pack, armed with keen intellect, ingenious camouflage, venomous fangs and bone-crushing jaws. Whether hunting or defending, their hardcore weaponry should be avoided at all costs! Dive into their world to experience their full, lethal potential -- and see what happens if we get in their way. They're elusive, powerful… and they're dangerous. They are the Ocean's Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Smrtni neprijatelji
programme.desc: In Africa, no other herbivore rivals the buffalo with its brute force and collective strategy; honed over millennia in an evolutionary blood feud with the ultimate predator. For most of the year the breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the resident lion pride. Then, when the dry season sucks water away from the grasslands, they migrate beyond the reach of the killers, but risk starvation. Life is a perpetual Catch 22 for the buffaloes where payment for fresh water and sweet grasses is made in blood

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Australia, a continent unto itself…home to scores of creatures found nowhere else in the world. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of animals, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the Great Barrier Reef to the Outback, to the urban jungle, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand these animals, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Australias Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Dr. Zeb Hogan travels down under to find an aquatic Australian icon - the Murray Cod - and to uncover why it has virtually disappeared from its namesake waterway - the Murray River. The race is on as scientists, conservationists and anglers join forces to keep these legendary monster fish alive

programme.title: Čovjek protiv geparda
programme.desc: The fastest mammal on land meets its greatest challenger, man. Two of the fastest players in the NFL, Devin Hester and Chris Johnson, will each race a cheetah. Who will win these unprecedented races

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill. Youll witness animal death strikes so fast, they cant even be captured in slow motion

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark

programme.title: Stvoreni za ubijanje
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Wade has been hard at work preparing his first Executive Protection dog for Latricia Duke, one of the top horse trainers in the country. There's only one problem Wade is deathly afraid of horses. Bobby comes to his aid to make sure that this dog and Wade- are comfortable working around horses

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Wade takes Kenny to a dog sport trial in Michigan to look at dogs that are for sale. Wade promises Kenny that he will see at least 10 dogs to buy. When they get to Michigan, nothing goes according to plan, and Wades head may be on the chopping block. Meanwhile, Danny, Bobby, and Luther work on a large sign for Big Lick Lake for Kennys birthday

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers

programme.title: Oni vrebaju noću
programme.desc: Expedition leader and wildlife filmmaker Martin Dohrn leads an expert team of night filming specialists into the jungles of Costa Rica on the hunt for Central America's big cats. Pumas, ocelots and the elusive jaguar all live in the dense tropical forest but filming them it’s far from an easy task(c)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb is in search of a fish with a terrifying reputation. Wolf fish, known locally as haimara, can reach one-meter in length, weigh as much as 88 pounds and are a species said to be a brutal hunter-of animals and reportedly even humans(c)

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Russia's Caucasus Mountains create a dramatic landscape of contradictions from snow-laden hills and alpine meadows to arid salt flats and dry desert

programme.title: Stvoreni za ubijanje
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail

programme.title: Smrtni neprijatelji
programme.desc: In Africa, no other herbivore rivals the buffalo with its brute force and collective strategy; honed over millennia in an evolutionary blood feud with the ultimate predator. For most of the year the breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the resident lion pride. Then, when the dry season sucks water away from the grasslands, they migrate beyond the reach of the killers, but risk starvation. Life is a perpetual Catch 22 for the buffaloes where payment for fresh water and sweet grasses is made in blood

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: These are predators whose appetites exceed any sense of self-control. These are the Worlds Deadliest: Hunger Games. Whether its the Burmese python eating every creature in sight in the Florida everglades; the tiger shark gobbling up giant schools of sardines; or the man-eating Tsavo lion terrorizing the African savannah, Hunger Games shows you animals whose diets never say die(c)

programme.title: Zmije u gradu
programme.desc: Simon, Nadine and snake-catcher in training Mike struggle through a sea of trash to rescue a deadly Black mamba, go for a pool party with a Burmese python and saves a rare, pregnant Green mamba from laying her eggs where they are not wanted

programme.title: Stvoreni za ubijanje
programme.desc: Lions are 400 pounds of muscle, teeth, and claw. Lion cubs are 4 pounds of blind, toothless, fluff-built not to kill, but to breastfeed. Built for the Kill: Lion follows the transformation of a helpless cub into an accomplished killer, exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail

programme.title: Smrtni neprijatelji
programme.desc: In Africa, no other herbivore rivals the buffalo with its brute force and collective strategy; honed over millennia in an evolutionary blood feud with the ultimate predator. For most of the year the breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the resident lion pride. Then, when the dry season sucks water away from the grasslands, they migrate beyond the reach of the killers, but risk starvation. Life is a perpetual Catch 22 for the buffaloes where payment for fresh water and sweet grasses is made in blood

programme.title: Oni vrebaju noću
programme.desc: Expedition leader and wildlife filmmaker Martin Dohrn leads an expert team of night filming specialists into the jungles of Costa Rica on the hunt for Central America's big cats. Pumas, ocelots and the elusive jaguar all live in the dense tropical forest but filming them it’s far from an easy task

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr Zeb Hogan is on a mission in the Indian Himalayas to investigate disturbing reports of a mammoth sized catfish called a Goonch - accused of stalking, attacking and killing people. (This is OK- I've seen this elsewhere, but any Discovery site is not good.) Zeb enlists the help of local guide and conservationist Vinay Badola, and together they head out to investigate the crime scenes along the Kali River. They'll raft through treacherous white water in an area known by locals as 'the Lost Country', where they meet with eye witnesses who give them detailed accounts of the attacks. Zeb then travels to the Ramganga River, the perfect place to spot and catch some Goonch. Commercial fishing is not allowed here so this river could be harbouring some giant fish. (Also- needs a source) His goal is to catch the Goonch and study its behaviour to determine whether these stories are fact or fiction

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: India, one of the oldest and culturally rich countries on the planet. Its Its millions of square miles contain six distinct climate zones and sustain nearly a billion people . Living within its arid deserts, lush jungles, and rugged mountains are scores of dangerous species. Among this myriad is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the forests of the Sunderbans, Indias deadly dozen creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met it first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Indias Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. When they come of age, like all juvenile males, they are exiled from the pride and must survive as nomads. Cast into the wilderness, they don't know how to hunt. Starvation is a daily threat. Battles with Pride Males teach harsh lessons. Tested to the limit, they must rely on each other. Can they beat the odds and win a kingdom? This is the Game of Prides

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Africas wild spaces host an incredible array of creatures…creatures who engage in a daily ballet of life and death. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the arid Saharan deserts in the north, to the lush plains of the south, to the expansive Nile River, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. programme.title: Divlja strana mačaka
programme.desc: Why do cats scratch your furniture? Insist on climbing up curtains and sitting on top of the bookshelf? Why do they rub up against your legs and chatter with their teeth when spying on birds in the yard? A team of cat experts including geneticist Dr. Leslie Lyons, Cat behaviourists Roger Tabor and Mieshelle Nagelschneider, and Kevin Fitzgerald a vet with years of experience treating feline ailments come together to answer the questions that plague cat owners everywhere

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: These are predators whose appetites exceed any sense of self-control. These are the Worlds Deadliest: Hunger Games. Whether its the Burmese python eating every creature in sight in the Florida everglades; the tiger shark gobbling up giant schools of sardines; or the man-eating Tsavo lion terrorizing the African savannah, Hunger Games shows you animals whose diets never say die

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: Kenny oversees the construction of a state-of-the-art kennel being built at VLK. But issues with construction are delaying the progress, and Kenny has to light a fire under his crew to complete the kennels in time for the upcoming K9 Olympics. Meanwhile, two members of the Oahu Police Department in Hawaii stop by VLK to pick up a money-detection dog

programme.title: Alfa psi
programme.desc: VLK is hosting the 13th annual K-9 Olympics this week. The K-9 Olympics consist of various challenges, searches, and obstacles designed to show the capabilities of the participants dogs. Kenny is hoping to finally be able to relax and enjoy the Olympics this year

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys

programme.title: Krokodil ljudožder
programme.desc: In Africas Croc Attack, American kayakers Ben Stookesberry and Chris Korbulic venture deep into the Congo to track down and capture one of the worlds deadliest predatorsa massive Nile crocodile that killed their friend and guide, Hendri Coetzee

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. When they come of age, like all juvenile males, they are exiled from the pride and must survive as nomads. Cast into the wilderness, they don't know how to hunt. Starvation is a daily threat. Battles with Pride Males teach harsh lessons. Tested to the limit, they must rely on each other. Can they beat the odds and win a kingdom? This is the Game of Prides

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Africas wild spaces host an incredible array of creatures…creatures who engage in a daily ballet of life and death. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the arid Saharan deserts in the north, to the lush plains of the south, to the expansive Nile River, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. This shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, power and skill surpasses all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Africas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Nothing like a fun day of frolicking at the beach…but venture past the surf and things could get ugly. For this is where nightmares lurk armed with jaws, posion, and unimaginable powers. They say enter at your own risk...but this time, it just happends to be true

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys

programme.title: Zmije u gradu
programme.desc: Summer is in full swing and snake bounty hunters, Simon and Nadine Keys face the largest Black Mamba theyve ever seen. Simon gets a new tattoo but before its fully healed hes attacked by a spitting cobra. Then, Simon and Nadine both are invited by friends to witness the birth of 15 baby Green Mambas

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana

Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Africas Deadly Dozen

programme.title: Krokodil ljudožder
programme.desc: In Africas Croc Attack, American kayakers Ben Stookesberry and Chris Korbulic venture deep into the Congo to track down and capture one of the worlds deadliest predatorsa massive Nile crocodile that killed their friend and guide, Hendri Coetzee

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Fish biologist Dr. Zeb Hogan travels to one of the world's most wild and remote locations: Kamchatka, in Russia's Far East, a place home to a mass migration of millions of salmon. It's this isolation that created one of the world's last truly wild salmon sanctuaries and with an incredible 14000 of the most remote and pristine rivers on Earth, it's not surprising that this is the perfect salmon habitat. Zeb wants to explore why there are so many salmon here. To do so he will have to find as many species as he can, test the water conditions, meet the locals and uncover some of the looming threats salmon could begin to face if this special place isn't protected more carefully. But in such a scarcely populated and unknown part of the world Zeb's mission won't be easy . He seeks the help of a team of world-class kayakers and tackles white water rapids, bears, volcanoes and poachers to find out why this land is home to so many salmon

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Stretching from the North Pole to the tropics, Asia is the largest continent on earth. It is the highest and most populated, and life here is harsh. To survive, the animals that inhabit this continent have evolved into the toughest of the tough

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: 24 sata u divljini
programme.desc: The Africa savannah crosses 25 countries and is home to millions of animals. Here herbivores and carnivores are caught in a constant struggle for survival. From the apex carnivore, the lion, to the humble meerkat, this film charts 24 hours of life here, through day, night and day again, revealing incredible behaviour driven by the evolutionary clock of time

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Budući da zbog gužve ne mogu normalno ploviti, lovci moraju prilagoditi taktiku i zaboraviti svoje planove žele li ispuniti zacrtano

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"
American Pickers
programme.desc: U automobilskoj oazi Mikea osvaja oldtajmer s turbo pogonom star stotinu godina. Dečki sklapaju dobre poslove u golemom raju za muškarce, a Frank spašava starinsku jurilicu od hrđe i zaborava

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kupci su u Santa Ani. Barry Weiss kupuje, ali Dave Hester oklijeva i nerado se baca na posao. U međuvremenu, Brandi pokušava zadržati Jarroda
programme.category: Plahte i luđaci, All Bid And No Bite

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi
Storage Wars
programme.desc: U Costa Mesi Dave Hester nalazi nešto što čovjeka može obradovati, a Darrell Sheets kupuje svoju najveću skladišnu jedinicu dosad u seriji, no hoće li mu ono donijeti najviše novca
programme.category: Bez ponude za umorne, Just Deserts

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Nestao je kamion koji je prevozio vrhunske odreske iz Teksasa, a vozač veteran ne odgovara na pozive. U međuvremenu kamion s opremom za dječju nogometnu ekipu nije uspio dopremiti robu do djece

programme.title: Lovci na kamione
programme.desc: Kad lopov ukrade cijevi za vađenje nafte, ekipe moraju naći ukradeni kamion prije nego što 29 vrijednih radnika s bušotine ostane bez posla. Iako su mislili da zadatak neće biti težak, dolazi do obrata u bespoštednom svijetu potrage za kamionima

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Klijent tvrdi da ima poklopac termonuklearne bojeve glave. Corey kreće u akciju kad mandolina Boba Willsa iz "Texas Playboysa" stigne u zalagaonicu. Chumlee pokušava otkriti u čemu je bolji od Ricka

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Pridružite se zvijezdama zalagaonice kad im u trgovinu stignu dvije stare majice s turneja "Aerosmitha". U nastavku Rick i Corey oglase alarm kad im stigne sirena za maglu iz američke mornarice

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Danny i dečki nalaze se s klijentom koji želi opako lakiranje za opaki "Anglia Dragster" iz 1959. godine. Shannon i Ryan od prenamjenjenog policijskog motocikla za klijenta izrađuju "Harley Davidson Bagger" po narudžbi

programme.title: Oživljavanje starih auta
programme.desc: Kevin i ekipa udružuju se kako bi napravili nešto posebno za Dannyja. Za to vrijeme automobil koji je nekoć pripadao "Kralju" baca Dannyja na koljena

programme.title: Leepu i Pitbull
programme.desc: "Pitbull" Steve uspješan je mehaničar koji je počeo od nule i izgradio posao. Leepu nalazi krntije koje uz pomoć starih čekića, lima i rezervnih dijelova preinačava u superautomobile koji će vas ostaviti bez daha

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu
programme.desc: Usred zime vozači prevaljuju stotine kilometara dok golemim kamionima prevoze opremu i potrepštine od ključne važnosti za rudare

programme.title: Jackie bez Jacka
Jackie without Jack
programme.desc: "Baš nikada ih ne objavljuj!" Priznati redatelj Patrick Jeudy otkriva razgovore s Jackie Kennedy snimljene nekoliko mjeseci nakon atentata na njezinoga supruga. Kakvu je tajnu htjela sačuvati

programme.title: Muzejske tajne
Mysteries at the Museum
programme.desc: Ova epizoda ispituje kartonsku kutiju punu kartica s imenima, lokacijama i drugim dokazima povezanima s neriješenim ubojstvima koja su uznemirila naciju sredinom prošlog stoljeća. (S2, Ep20)

programme.title: Tajna strana Drugoga svjetskoga rata
The Hidden Side of World War II
programme.desc: U ovoj se epozodi istražuje nürnberška suđenja na kojima su Saveznici nakon rata sudili istaknutim vođama nacističke Njemačke koji su sudjelovali u holokaustu i drugim ratnim zločinima

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Tim putuje u selo na prekrasnoj obali Sjeverne Umbrije kako bi istražio neobičan rt u kojem su se tijekom proteklih godina pojavili tajanstveni dijelovi ljudskih kostiju
